Front Axle, Driving 02

AXLE ASSEMBLY (FRONT DRIVE AXLE), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Clean, inspect and adjust wheel bearings and brake shoes

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Front Drive Axles A02-3100 Models, ALL 3.5

AXLE FLANGE, BUSHING AND/OR SEAL (FRONT DRIVE AXLE), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Side A02-3160 Models, ALL 0.7
Both Sides A02-3161 Models, ALL 1.1

AXLE HOUSING (FRONT DRIVE), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R brake components
3. R&R drive axle locking hubs
4. Clean, inspect wheel bearings, adjust steering stops, toe-in, and front brakes
5. R&R steering knuckle and arm(s)
6. R&R front drive axle shaft(s) and seals
7. R&R differential
8. Adjust toe-in and steering stops

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A02-110 Models, ALL 9.7

AXLE SHAFT AND/OR SEALS (FRONT DRIVE), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Either side A02-3190 Models, ALL 3.9
Both sides A02-3191 Models, ALL 6.9

BREATHER (VENT), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Front Drive Axles A02-240 Models, ALL 0.3

DIFFERENTIAL CARRIER ASSEMBLY (FRONT DRIVE AXLE / REMOVED), Repair

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Adjust

Excludes:
1. DIFFERENTIAL CARRIER OR GASKET (FRONT DRIVING AXLE), R & R AND/OR REPLACE

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Front Drive Axles With Ring Gear A02-150 Models, ALL 8.0
All Front Drive Axles Without Ring Gear A02-151 Models, ALL 6.0

DIFFERENTIAL CARRIER OR GASKET (FRONT DRIVING AXLE), R & R and/or Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
A02-3120 Models, ALL 8.5

PINION SHAFT OIL SEAL, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Front Drive Axles A02-145 Models, ALL 1.2

PLUG (FILL OR DRAIN), Replace

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Front Drive Axles A02-250 Models, ALL 0.3

SPINDLE (FRONT DRIVING AXLE), Replace

Includes:
1. R&R brake drum, hub, shoes, slack adjuster and wheel seal
2. R&R drive axle flange and seal
3. R&R drive axle spider
4. R&R ABS wheel sensor
5. Clean, inspect and adjust wheel bearings and brake shoes

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Spindle A02-3205 Models, ALL 2.3
Both Spindles A02-3206 Models, ALL 4.2

STEERING ARM (FRONT DRIVE AXLE), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Adjust toe-in and steering stops

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Front Drive Axles A02-230 Models, ALL 0.9

STEERING KNUCKLE (FRONT DRIVE AXLE), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R brake drum, hub, shoes, slack adjuster and wheel seal
3. R&R drive axle flange and seal
4. R&R drive axle spider
5. R&R ABS wheel sensor
6. R&R drive axle spindle spindle
7. Clean, inspect and adjust wheel bearings and brake shoes

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Knuckle A02-3210 Models, ALL 3.4
Both Knuckles A02-3211 Models, ALL 6.3

TIE ROD END(S), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Adjust toe-in

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One End A02-220 Models, ALL 0.9
Both Ends A02-221 Models, ALL 1.1

WHEEL SEAL (FRONT DRIVE AXLE), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Clean, inspect and adjust wheel bearings
3. R&R drive flange or locking hubs
4. R&R hub assembly

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
One Side A02-3200 Models, ALL 1.5
Both Sides A02-3201 Models, ALL 2.7

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A02-T1 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A02-T2 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A02-T3 Models, ALL 0.0
